title: API Configuration
description: Sets up a DELETE endpoint at /ts/pets/:id for removing a pet from the system.

title: ID Validation
description: Checks that the pet ID in the URL is valid before trying to delete it.

title: Soft Delete
description: Instead of immediately removing the pet, marks it for deletion and schedules it to be permanently removed later (gives you a chance to undo if needed).

title: Not Found
description: If the pet doesn't exist, returns a 404 error.

title: Logging
description: Records the deletion with details about when the pet will be permanently removed.

title: Success Response
description: Returns confirmation that the pet is scheduled for deletion, including when it will be permanently removed.

title: Error Handling
description: Catches problems like invalid IDs or other errors and returns appropriate messages.
